nodes.text: Roggwarts were large predatory beasts. A distinguishing anatomical feature were a pair of curving horns growing from the sides of their heads. They had a long tail and thick skin. Gor was a pet roggwart owned by General Grievous during the Clone Wars.

During the Clone Wars, General Grievous kept a pet roggwart named Gor in his castle on Vassek's third moon. Gor was roughly the size of a rancor, and was outfitted with battle armor, including a chest plate with mechanical arms, and helmet. He was released to attack Jedi Master Kit Fisto, his former padawan, Nahdar Vebb, and clone commander Fil, in Grievous' castle. In the end, Gor was defeated by Kit Fisto in Grievous' own home.
